# AbstractVision

> Model-agnostic generative vision API (images, optional video) with a packaged capability registry, artifact-ref outputs, and backends for OpenAI-compatible HTTP, Diffusers, and stable-diffusion.cpp.

This repositoryâ€™s current source of truth is the code under `src/abstractvision/`.

Key reality checks for agents:
- Built-in backends implement `text_to_image` and `image_to_image`.
- `text_to_video` and `image_to_video` are supported only via the OpenAI-compatible backend when video endpoints are configured.
- `multi_view_image` exists in the API but no built-in backend implements it yet.

## Documentation

- [README](README.md): overview, install, quickstart
- [Docs index](docs/README.md): documentation map
- [Getting started](docs/getting-started.md): REPL walkthroughs for Diffusers / stable-diffusion.cpp / OpenAI-compatible
- [FAQ](docs/faq.md): common questions + troubleshooting
- [API](docs/api.md): public Python API surface
- [Architecture](docs/architecture.md): component overview + diagrams
- [Backends reference](docs/reference/backends.md): backend support matrix + notes
- [Configuration reference](docs/reference/configuration.md): CLI/REPL commands + `ABSTRACTVISION_*` env vars
- [Capabilities registry](docs/reference/capabilities-registry.md): registry format + usage
- [Artifacts](docs/reference/artifacts.md): artifact-ref outputs + stores
- [AbstractCore integration](docs/reference/abstractcore-integration.md): capability plugin + tool helpers
- [Contributing](CONTRIBUTING.md): dev setup + tests + contribution guidelines
- [Security](SECURITY.md): responsible vulnerability reporting
- [Acknowledgments](ACKNOWLEDMENTS.md): upstream projects

## Code entry points

- [VisionManager](src/abstractvision/vision_manager.py): orchestrator API + gating + store logic
- [Backend interface](src/abstractvision/backends/base_backend.py): `VisionBackend` contract
- [Backends package](src/abstractvision/backends/__init__.py): lazy imports
- [HTTP backend](src/abstractvision/backends/openai_compatible.py): OpenAI-compatible adapter (+ optional video)
- [Diffusers backend](src/abstractvision/backends/huggingface_diffusers.py): local Diffusers T2I/I2I
- [stable-diffusion.cpp backend](src/abstractvision/backends/stable_diffusion_cpp.py): GGUF via sd-cli / python bindings
- [Capability registry loader](src/abstractvision/model_capabilities.py): loader + validator
- [Artifacts/stores](src/abstractvision/artifacts.py): `LocalAssetStore` + runtime adapter
- [CLI/REPL](src/abstractvision/cli.py): `abstractvision` command
- [AbstractCore plugin](src/abstractvision/integrations/abstractcore_plugin.py): capability plugin
- [AbstractCore tools](src/abstractvision/integrations/abstractcore.py): `make_vision_tools(...)`

## Testing

- [Test suite](tests/): run `python -m unittest discover -s tests -p "test_*.py" -q`
- [Changelog](CHANGELOG.md): release notes

## Optional

- [Engineering backlog](docs/backlog/README.md): internal design notes + completion reports
- [Playground](playground/README.md): minimal web UI for AbstractCore Server vision job endpoints (`/v1/vision/*`)
